    • Constructor Detail

      • AI_player

        public AI_player(double x,
                 double y,
                 double w,
                 double h,
                 double r,
                 double a,
                 int team,
                 java.lang.String role,
                 java.lang.String ai_id,
                 com.cycapservers.game.GameState g,
                 com.cycapservers.game.PlayerStats stats)
        constructor for the AI player
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate
        y - y-coordinate
        w - width
        h - height
        r - radius
        a - alpha
        team - either 1 or 2
        role - what class is the AI player using
        ai_id - unique identification for the player
        g - GameState reference
        stats - statistical information for the AI player

    • Method Detail

      • get_path

        public void get_path(com.cycapservers.game.GameState g)
        function that takes care of things relating to path generation, but doesn't do the path generation. sets timers and variables related to getting a new path
        Parameters:
        g - GameState reference

      • get_distance_to_target

        public double get_distance_to_target()
        basically just a distance formula method for finding the distance between the AI player and the end of the path
        Returns:
        a double that is the distance between what was said above

      • update

        public void update(com.cycapservers.game.GameState g,
                   com.cycapservers.game.InputSnapshot s)
        This function takes care of updating everything for the AI player in real time. It takes care of the path finding, shooting, health, re-spawning
        Specified by:
        update in class com.cycapservers.game.GameCharacter
        Parameters:
        g - GameState reference
        s - input snapshot which will always be null because this is the AI player and there is no keyboard input

      • toDataString

        public java.lang.String toDataString(java.lang.String client_id)
        Forms part of a string that'll be sent back to the client
        Overrides:
        toDataString in class com.cycapservers.game.Entity
        Parameters:
        client_id - the client's id which is entity id for this

      • die

        public void die()
        sets the coordinates for re-spawning because the AI player died. Also sets the dead variable
        Specified by:
        die in class com.cycapservers.game.GameCharacter

      • takeDamage

        public void takeDamage(int amount)
        when a bullet from the other team collides with an AI player this function reduces the health to the correct amount
        Overrides:
        takeDamage in class com.cycapservers.game.GameCharacter
        Parameters:
        amount - amount of damage which the health will be reduced by. If it's more than the remaining health the player will die.

      • getRandomNode

        public mapNode getRandomNode(com.cycapservers.game.GameState g)
        gets a random node that isn't a wall
        Parameters:
        g - GameState reference
        Returns:
        the node that is a valid location on the map
